name: rally-study-template

scripts.build: cp manifest.prod.json manifest.json && npm run build:glean && rollup -c && npm run tailwind
scripts.dev: cp manifest.dev.json manifest.json && npm run build:glean && npm run tailwind && npm-run-all --parallel dev:extension dev:webext
scripts.lint: npm run build && eslint . && npm run lint:glean
scripts.build:glean: npm run build:glean:metrics && npm run build:glean:docs
scripts.build:developer: cp manifest.dev.json manifest.json && rollup -c --config-enable-developer-mode && npm run tailwind
scripts.build:emulator: cp manifest.prod.json manifest.json && rollup -c --config-enable-emulator-mode && npm run tailwind
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run package:webext
scripts.package:developer: npm run build:developer && npm run package:webext -- -n developer.zip --overwrite-dest
scripts.package:emulator: npm run build:emulator && npm run package:webext -- -n emulator.zip --overwrite-dest

description: This a basic template for a Rally study.
author: Mozilla
